commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<%- include('../partials/head'); -%> <%- include('../partials/header'); -%>

data_user.name

<% if (locals.dataLocal) { %> <%- include('../partials/categorybar',{data : dataLocal}); -%> <% } %>
<%- include('../partials/navbar'); -%> <% if (page_layout == '/') { %> <%- include('../partials/slider'); -%> <% } %>
<% switch (page_layout) { case '/' : %> <%- include('./home',{data : products}); -%> <% break; case 'detail-product' : %> <% if (dataDetail || comments) { %> <%- include('./product-detail',{data : dataDetail,data1 : comments,data2:count}); -%> <% } %> <% break; case 'products' : %> <% if (danhmucsp && sanpham) { %> <%- include('./products',{data1 : danhmucsp,data2 : sanpham}); -%> <% } %> <% break; case 'search' : %> <%- include('./search',{data : sanpham}); -%> <% break; default: break; } %> <%- include('../partials/footer'); -%>
